atDirectives.name: @apply
atDirectives.description: Use @apply to inline any existing utility classes into your own custom CSS.

atDirectives.name: @layer
atDirectives.description: Use @layer to tell Tailwind which "bucket" a set of custom styles belong to.

atDirectives.name: @utility
atDirectives.description: Use @utility to register new utility classes.

atDirectives.name: @reference
atDirectives.description: Use @reference to reference another CSS file.

atDirectives.name: @tailwind
atDirectives.description: Use @tailwind to insert Tailwind's base, components, utilities and variants styles into your CSS.

atDirectives.name: @variants
atDirectives.description: Use @variants to generate responsive, hover, focus, and other variants of your own utilities.

atDirectives.name: @responsive
atDirectives.description: Use @responsive to generate responsive variants of your own utilities.

atDirectives.name: @screen
atDirectives.description: Use @screen to create media queries that reference your breakpoints by name.
